question: World Bank decided to contribute what percent of the total cost of the Pro-Poor Tourism Development Project in Uttar Pradesh?
explanation: World Bank approved 57.14 million dollars for the Pro-Poor Tourism Development Project in Uttar Pradesh and decided to contribute 70% of it (40 million US dollars). The rest will be contributed by the UP government. The main objective of this project is to uplift job-oriented economic activities related to tourism.
